name: Unknown
line: It's... it's polycarbonate. It can't get through.

name: Unknown
line: What's going on down there? Does anybody copy?

name: Unknown
line: We need to make Will sleep.

name: Unknown
line: What? He's a spy. If he knows where we are, so does the shadow monster.

name: Unknown
line: He killed those soldiers. He'll kill us, too!

name: Will
line: He's lying! He's lying! He's lying! He's lying! He's lying!

name: Joyce
line: Okay, Will, Will, listen, listen. Do you know who I am? Do you know who I am?

name: Will
line: No! No! Let go! No! No! Let me go! Let go! No, let me go!

name: Will
line: Let me go! Let me go! Let me go!

name: Unknown
line: We gotta go. We gotta go.

name: Billy
line: Yeah, I'm a little bit busy in here, Susan.

name: Neil
line: We can't find Maxine. And her window's open.

name: Billy
line: Look, I'm sure she just, I don't know, went to the arcade or something. I'm sure she's fine.

name: Neil
line: You were supposed to watch her.

name: Billy
line: I know, Dad. I was. It's just you guys were three hours late, and, well, I have a date. I'm sorry, okay?

name: Neil
line: That's why you've been staring at yourself in the mirror like some faggot instead of watching your sister?

name: Billy
line: I have been looking after her all week, Dad. Okay? She wants to run off, then that's her problem, all right? She's 13 years old. She shouldn't need a full-time babysitter. And she's not my sister!

name: Neil
line: What did we talk about? What did we... talk about?

name: Neil
line: That is right. Now, apologize to Susan.

name: Neil
line: No, it's not okay. Nothing about his behavior is okay. But he's gonna make up for it. He's gonna call whatever whore he's seeing tonight and cancel their date. And then he's gonna go find his sister. Like the good, kind, respecting brother that he is. Isn't that right, Billy? Isn't that right?

name: Neil
line: I'm sorry, I couldn't hear you.

name: Dustin
line: Yes. He had the same exact yellow pattern on his butt.

name: Lucas
line: He was tiny two days ago.

name: Dustin
line: Well, he's molted three times already.

name: Dustin
line: Molted. Shed his skin to make room for growth like hornworms.

name: Dustin
line: It's gotta be soon. When he does, he'll be fully grown, or close to it. And so will his friends.

name: Steve
line: Yeah, and he's gonna eat a lot more than just cats.

name: Steve
line: What are you talking about? He ate Mews.

name: Dustin
line: I knew it! You kept him! No! No. No, I... No, I... He missed me. He wanted to come home.

name: Dustin
line: I didn't know he was a Demogorgon, okay?

name: Lucas
line: Oh, so now you admit it?

name: Steve
line: Guys, who cares? We have to go.

name: Lucas
line: I care! You put the party in jeopardy! You broke the rule of law!

name: Dustin
line: You told a stranger the truth!

name: Dustin
line: You wanted to tell her, too!

name: Lucas
line: But I didn't, Lucas, okay? I didn't tell her! We both broke the rule of law, okay? So we're even. We're even.

name: Dustin
line: No, no! We're not even. Don't even try that. Your stupid pet could have ate us for dinner!

name: Lucas
line: He was crawling to come say hello?

name: Max
line: No, no, no. Hey, guys, why are you headed towards the sound?

name: Unknown
line: Look, this is us, and this is the nearest exit. But even if we somehow make it there, there's no way out.

name: Unknown
line: If there's a power outage, the building goes on lockdown.

name: Unknown
line: With a computer, sure, but somebody's gotta reset the breakers.

name: Unknown
line: Breakers are in the basement, three floors down.

name: Hopper
line: Then we get out of here.

name: Unknown
line: No, then the power comes back on. If you wanna unlock the doors, you have to reboot the computer system, and then override the security codes with a manual input.

name: Hopper
line: Fine, how do I do that?

name: Unknown
line: You can't. Not unless you know BASIC.

name: Hopper
line: I don't know what that means.

name: Owens
line: Shall I teach you French while I'm at it, Jim? How about a little German?

name: Hopper
line: How about you, Doc? You speak BASIC?

name: Bob
line: Okay, I got this. I got this.

name: Bob
line: It's okay. It's gonna be okay. Remember, Bob Newby, superhero.

name: Hopper
line: All right, you know how to use one of these?

name: Hopper
line: Safety on. Safety off. Point. Squeeze. Point and squeeze. Okay. Easy-peasy. If anything happens down there, I want you to come right back up. Right back here. Listen. Don't wait for me. As soon as I get those doors open... I'm gonna get them out.

name: Bob
line: Okay, well... I'll be in touch.

name: Nancy
line: I think there's something in the woods.

name: Steve
line: We're looking for Mike and Will.

name: Nancy
line: They're not in there, are they?

name: Unknown
line: We haven't seen Will... I haven't seen him since...

name: Dustin
line: Son of a bitch! You know what...

name: Hopper
line: Okay, Bob, can you hear us?

name: Bob
line: Loud and clear, Doc. Can you hear me back?

name: Bob
line: All right, give me a minute.

name: Bob
line: Hey! I got it! I got it!

name: Unknown
line: Son of a bitch did it.

name: Bob
line: Any more surprises, I'll let you know.

name: Owens
line: I'm gonna guide you, okay? Is there a problem?

name: Bob
line: No, it's just... It's, uh, getting a little crowded up here, so we're gonna have to take this slow.

name: Owens
line: Okay. All right, just start walking.

name: Owens
line: Now, keep going, keep going, keep going...

name: Owens
line: Bob, there's a door on your left, do you see that?

name: Owens
line: Yeah, I need you to get in it. What? Now! Right now. Get in the closet.

name: Owens
line: How you holding up there, Bob? You all right?

name: Owens
line: You got a pretty clear shot to the front door.

name: Owens
line: You can do this, okay? You're almost home free, all right, Bob?

name: Unknown
line: Come on! Come on, let's go! Let's go! Come on!

name: Mike
line: I'm sorry, bud. Sorry I wasn't there. I should have been here.

name: Hopper
line: Sam Owens. Dr. Sam Owens. I don't know how many people are there! I don't know how many people are left alive! I am the police! Chief Jim Hopper!

name: Unknown
line: Is there a number I can reach you at?

name: Hopper
line: Yes, the number that I gave you, yes.

name: Unknown
line: Okay, yes, I got it. 6767... I will be here.

name: Mike
line: They didn't believe you, did they?

name: Mike
line: 'We'll see'? We can't just sit here while those things are loose!

name: Hopper
line: We stay here, and we wait for help.

name: Mike
line: Did you guys know that Bob was the original founder of Hawkins AV?

name: Mike
line: He petitioned the school to start it and everything. Then he had a fund-raiser for equipment. Mr. Clarke learned everything from him. Pretty awesome, right?

name: Mike
line: We can't let him die in vain.

name: Dustin
line: What do you want to do, Mike? The Chief's right on this. We can't stop those Demo-dogs on our own.

name: Dustin
line: Demogorgon dogs. Demo-dogs. It's like a compound. It's like a play on words...

name: Dustin
line: I mean, when it was just Dart, maybe... But there's an army now.

name: Mike
line: His army. Maybe if we stop him, we can stop his army, too.

name: Mike
line: It got Will that day on the field. The doctor said it was like a virus, it infected him.

name: Max
line: And so this virus, it's connecting him to the tunnels?

name: Mike
line: To the tunnels, monsters, the Upside Down, everything.

name: Mike
line: Okay, so, the shadow monster's inside everything. And if the vines feel something like pain, then so does Will.

name: Mike
line: Yeah. Like what Mr. Clarke taught us.

name: Dustin
line: A collective consciousness. It's a super-organism.

name: Mike
line: And this is the thing that controls everything. It's the brain.

name: Dustin
line: It's a monster from an unknown dimension. It's so ancient that it doesn't even know its true home. It enslaves races of other dimensions by taking over their brains using its highly-developed psionic powers.

name: Max
line: Oh, my God, none of this is real. This is a kids' game.

name: Dustin
line: No, it's a manual. And it's not for kids. And unless you know something that we don't, this is the best metaphor...

name: Max
line: Analogy? That's what you're worried about? Fine. An analogy for understanding whatever the hell this is.

name: Nancy
line: Okay, so this mind flamer thing...

name: Dustin
line: To conquer us, basically. It believes it's the master race.

name: Dustin
line: If the Nazis were from another dimension, totally. Uh, it views other races, like us, as inferior to itself.

name: Mike
line: It wants to spread, take over other dimensions.

name: Lucas
line: We are talking about the destruction of our world as we know it.

name: Steve
line: That's great. That's great. That's really great. Jesus!

name: Mike
line: Okay, so if this thing is like a brain that's controlling everything, then if we kill it...

name: Steve
line: Great. So how do you kill this thing? Shoot it with Fireballs or something?

name: Dustin
line: No. No, no Fire... No Fireballs. Uh, you summon an undead army, uh, because... because zombies, you know, they don't have brains, and the mind flayer, it... it... It likes brains. It's just a game. It's a game.

name: Steve
line: What the hell are we doing here?

name: Mike
line: I thought we were waiting for your military backup.

name: Mike
line: How are they gonna stop this? You can't just shoot this with guns.

name: Hopper
line: You don't know that! We don't know anything!

name: Mike
line: We know it's already killed everybody in that lab.

name: Lucas
line: We know the monsters are gonna molt again.

name: Dustin
line: We know that it's only a matter of time before those tunnels reach this town.

name: Joyce
line: They're right. We have to kill it.

name: Hopper
line: Me, too, Joyce, okay? But how do we do that? We don't exactly know what we're dealing with here.

name: Mike
line: No. But he does. If anyone knows how to destroy this thing, it's Will. He's connected to it. He'll know its weakness.

name: Max
line: I thought we couldn't trust him anymore. That he's a spy for the mind flayer now.

name: Mike
line: Yeah, but he can't spy if he doesn't know where he is.

name: Steve
line: What you did, um, helping the kids... that was... really cool.

name: Steve
line: Those little shits are real trouble, you know?

name: Dustin
line: Hey. I'm... I'm sorry about Dart and all. I guess I just thought that he was my friend. I was wrong. I broke the rule of law, so if you want your girlfriend to take over my spot in the party, I understand.

name: Dustin
line: I saw you two holding hands in the bus, Lucas.

name: Dustin
line: Maybe, but I could feel it.

name: Mike
line: I get why El was your mage now.

name: Mike
line: Lucas. He told me all about her.

name: Mike
line: And just because you know the truth, it doesn't mean you're in our party. You do know that, right?

name: Max
line: I mean, why would you want a stupid zoomer in your party anyway?

name: Mike
line: I'm just saying, El? She sounds like she was really awesome.

name: Mike
line: Until that thing took her. Just like it took Bob.

name: Joyce
line: You sure this is gonna work?

name: Mike
line: It's gonna work. It has to.

name: Jonathan
line: If he finds out where we are... will he send those dogs after us?

name: Will
line: What? What? What is this? What? What is this? Why am I tied up?

name: Mike
line: Will, we just wanna talk to you. We're not gonna hurt you.

name: Joyce
line: You recognize this? Do you recognize this?

name: Joyce
line: Hey. We wanna help you. But to do that, we have to understand how to kill it.

name: Will
line: Why am I tied up? Why am I tied up? Why am I tied up? Why am I tied up?

name: Will
line: Why am I tied up? Why am I tied up? Let me go! Let me go! Let me go! Let me go! Let me go! Let me go! Let me go! Let me go! Let me go! Let me go! Let me go!

name: Joyce
line: Do you know what March 22nd is? It's your birthday. Your birthday.

name: Joyce
line: When you turned eight, I gave you that huge box of crayons. Do you remember that? It was 120 colors. And all your friends, they got you Star Wars toys, but all you wanted to do was draw with all your new colors.

name: Joyce
line: And you drew this big spaceship, but it wasnâ€™t from a movie. It was your spaceship. A rainbow ship is what you called it. And you must have used every color in the box.

name: Joyce
line: I took that with me to Melvald's and I put it up and I told everyone who came in, 'My son drew this.' And you were so embarrassed. But I was so proud. I was so, so proud.

name: Jonathan
line: Do you remember the day Dad left? We stayed up all night building Castle Byers... just the way you drew it. And it took so long because you were so bad at hammering. You'd miss the nail every time.

name: Jonathan
line: And then it started raining, but we stayed out there anyway. We were both sick for like a week after that. But we just had to finish it, didn't we? We just had to.

name: Mike
line: Do you remember the first day that we met? It was... It was the first day of kindergarten. I knew nobody. I had no friends and... I just felt so alone and so scared, but...

name: Mike
line: I saw you on the swings and you were alone, too. You were just swinging by yourself. And I just walked up to you and... I asked. I asked if you wanted to be my friend. And you said yes. You said yes. It was the best thing I've ever done.

name: Joyce
line: Will, baby... if you're in there, just please... please talk to us. Please, honey, please, can you do that for me? Please. I love you so much.

name: Hopper
line: I think he's talking, just not with words.

name: Mike
line: Will's still in there. He's talking to us.

name: Jonathan
line: Do you remember the first time I played you this? Mom and Dad were both arguing in the next room. So I played you the mix tape I made you. And it was the first time you got into music. Real music.

name: Jonathan
line: And then the party escaped into the sewers, and there were those big insect things, and you guys were still on level one.

name: Mike
line: Then you cast Fog Cloud and you saved us. You saved the whole party.

name: Hopper
line: You saw that little girl and she was in the sandbox and she was crying.

name: Hopper
line: You gave him your Tonka Truck and I told you we couldn't afford to buy another one.

name: Hopper
line: You said she should have it because she's sad. 'She's sad, Mommy.'

name: Joyce
line: I love you so much. So, so much.

name: Max
line: Do you think he heard that?

name: Hopper
line: It's just a phone. It could be anywhere. Right?

name: Hopper
line: Hey. Hey, can you hear me?

name: Will
line: It knows. It knows where we are.

name: Hopper
line: Come on. We gotta go. We gotta go.

name: Hopper
line: Come on, come on. Let's go. Let's go.

name: Hopper
line: Hey. Hey, get away from the windows!

name: Hopper
line: Do you know how to use this?
